resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/78244</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78244</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>990081bb-0ab3-11d8-9337-00e02919317d#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Jácintkék arara</string>
            <string language="en">Hyacinth-blue macaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hyazinthe-blaues macaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">macaw Jacinthe-bleu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">macaw Hyacinth-azul</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">macaw Giacinto-blu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Υάκινθος-μπλε macaw</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">macaw Jacinto-azul</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A papagájok egyik legnagyobb termetű képviselője, a jácintkék arara magokkal, gyümölcsökkel táplálkozik.</string>
            <string language="en">The hyacinth-blue macaw, one of the biggest-statured representatives of parrots eats grains and fruits</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">esőerdő,  papagájok,  Dél-Amerika,  </string>
            <string language="en">rain forest, parrots, South America</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Hyazinthe-blaue macaw, einer der 
größten-statured Repräsentanten der Papageien ißt Körner und 
Früchte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le macaw jacinthe-bleu, un des grands-statured 
représentants des perroquets mange des grains et des fruits</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O macaw hyacinth-azul, um dos representantes os 
mais grandes-statured dos papagaios come grões e frutas</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il macaw giacinto-blu, uno dei rappresentanti più
grandi-statured dei pappagalli mangia i grani e le frutte</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο υάκινθος-μπλε macaw, ένα από μεγάλος- οι 
αντιπρόσωποι των παπαγάλων τρώει τα σιτάρια και τα φρούτα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El macaw jacinto-azul, uno de los representantes 
ma's grandes-statured de loros come granos y las frutas</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Regenwald, Papageien, Südamerika</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">forêt tropicale, perroquets, Amérique du sud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">floresta de chuva, papagaios, Ámérica do Sul</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">foresta di pioggia, pappagalli, Sudamerica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τροπικό δάσος, παπαγάλοι, Νότια Αμερική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">selva tropical, loros, Suramérica</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>78244</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=990081bb-0ab3-11d8-9337-00e02919317d&v=1&b=2</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
